title: A multi-scale large kernel attention with U-Net for medical image registration
details: Y Chen, X Hu, T Lu, L Zou, X Liao - The Journal of Supercomputing, 2025
abstract: Deformable image registration minimizes the discrepancy between moving and fixed images by establishing linear and nonlinear spatial correspondences. It plays a crucial role in surgical navigation, image fusion and disease analysis. Its challenge …
